text: Flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. Whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. It is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing

text: As children head back to school, parents are requested to reinforce the lesson that railroad tracks should never be used as a path or shortcut

text: Please join Metra in reminding everone to Look, Listen, and Live
textLower: please join metra in reminding everone to look, listen, and live

text: When using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. Use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. Remember to look, listen, and live.
textLower: when using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. remember to look, listen, and live.

text: Please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities
textLower: please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities

text: On weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. You may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers
textLower: on weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. you may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers

text: This is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver
textLower: this is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver

text: You should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. Any time is train time. Look, listen, and live. Thank you
textLower: you should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. any time is train time. look, listen, and live. thank you

text: Did you know that railroad tracks are private property? Do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. Always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. Trespassing is dangerous and illegal. Stay off, stay away, and stay alive.
textLower: did you know that railroad tracks are private property? do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. trespassing is dangerous and illegal. stay off, stay away, and stay alive.

text: A train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. If you see a train coming, do not cross the tracks. Make sure that you don't stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way
textLower: a train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. if you see a train coming, do not cross the tracks. make sure that you don't stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way

text: Flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. Whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. It is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing
textLower: flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. it is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing

text: Do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. Make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. Trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. Being boxed in can cost you your life
textLower: do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. being boxed in can cost you your life

text: An operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at
textLower: an operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at

text: Your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from Metra, the Union Pacific Railroad, the Burlington Northern Santa Fe, and all of Metra's employees and labor organizations. Please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. Always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. Be safe: always stop, look, and listen. Please convey this message to your children
textLower: your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from metra, the union pacific railroad, the burlington northern santa fe, and all of metra's employees and labor organizations. please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. be safe: always stop, look, and listen. please convey this message to your children
